account(address,bytes32,uint256,address,.details: Returns the computed token bound account address for a non-fungible token.

returns._0: The address of the token bound account

createAccount(address,bytes32,uint256,ad.details: Creates a token bound account for a non-fungible token. If account has already been created, returns the account address without calling create2. Emits ERC6551AccountCreated event.

returns._0: The address of the token bound account

documentation.text: @dev The registry MUST emit the ERC6551AccountCreated event upon successful account creation.
@dev The registry MUST revert with AccountCreationFailed error if the create2 operation fails.

@dev Returns the computed token bound account address for a non-fungible token.
 @return account The address of the token bound account
